item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving everyone! Come join in as we thank our best friends for being there for us all year long. They keep us company, they make us laugh, they protect us from the big wide world and they take their jobs very seriously. We can't wait to help you snuggle them back, tell them how special they are and play games...all sorts! Like DUCK DUCK TURKEY, BOBBING FOR CARROTS and TURKEY PAW PAINTING.

Special treat for any one who makes a donation of pet food or supplies to help local shelters keep our furry friends who are less fortunate fed, warm, & happy over the holidays.

Don't forget to bring updated vaccines as necessary: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordetella.

See you all soon!

Luv & puppy paws,
Auntie Becky
item.name: Happy Thanksgiving!
